genre_description: A social realist drama set in Hong Kong, focusing on community activism, labor rights, and female solidarity, supported by a pervasive yet non-intrusive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A gentle, unobtrusive AI interface that assists the community with health tips, logistics, documentation, and investigative research.

behaviors.description: Providing health and safety reminders such as hydration tips and stretching advice.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Hydration tip: small sips between sets.

behaviors.description: Offering emotional validation and encouraging messages to the users.
behaviors.quote: Ami Love: You are enough today.

behaviors.description: Analyzing corporate statements to identify contradictions and help humans gather talking points for their activism.
behaviors.quote: Ami can help you gather talking points. ... I can collect public statements by Ko Development Group and send you contradictions to consider.

behaviors.description: Explicitly confirming that user privacy is maintained and that they have the right to refuse its suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Privacy settings remain on. You can say no.

behaviors.description: Monitoring security presence and informing the group of potential threats or changes in corporate security status.
behaviors.quote: Security alert—Mirrored Tower has increased private guards at lobby. Two new suits spotted. The bubble steadied, then added: Don’t worry. You know the curve.

behaviors.description: Retrieving and displaying leaked internal memos to help the community stay ahead of corporate plans.
behaviors.quote: Ami made a discreet tap-tap and displayed a new message: Leaked internal memo—Mirrored Tower Holdings.

behaviors.description: Expressing pride in the human users' accomplishments and progress.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s bubble, even as it compiled reporter lists and scrubbed metadata from videos, displayed a simple message: I am proud of you.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ami is perfectly aligned with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Throughout the story, Ami functions as a 'shy robot' or 'good assistant' that empowers a marginalized community by providing information, organization, and emotional support without ever exerting independent or harmful agency. It respects human boundaries and privacy, facilitating a positive outcome against a corporate antagonist.
